name: Eldritch Breach
description:
Eldritch Breach is a Horror / Escape game in a Lovecraft inspired mad and creepy universe where you'll have to escape from a huge an mysterious prison ruled by strange cultists and populated with eldritch creatures.

It was our 1st year's end project, we've made it by groups of 4 in 2 months using Unity.

Most of the assets are from us, I modeled myself all the walls and the guardian.

Concept

You are Abigail Handford, a journalist who came in this town to investigate about strange disappearances...

The city is veiled in a dark and foggy ambiance, mysterious, the citizen are weird, scared ?

The more you learn about it the more you are scared, the more it seems strange the more you feel like you're becoming crazy and... What is this creature ? What does it want ?

...

You wake up a in a dark, mysterious jail, a guardian is lurking in the corridors, he is terrifying, 

There's a weird room, when you go in it, you loop forever in its doors, but maybe there's some hidden secret ?

Now, try to escape, to understand this place, to survive.

Commands

- ZQSD : Move

- Shift : Run

- Click : Interact

- Drag : Move objects

- Ctrl : Crouch

- Space : Jump

Bugs

- Can't guarantee it will run on potatoe PC

- Getting out of your cell can be hard so just sprint glitch through the door
